wines.description: A 2017 wine from Paso Robles, California, showcasing crisp acidity and vibrant aromatics. This wine represents quality winemaking and terroir expression, offering exceptional drinking pleasure.

tastingNotes.aroma: Bright aromas of melon and lemon zest lead the nose, accented by white flowers. Underlying wet stone adds terroir complexity. The profile is fresh, vibrant, and inviting.
tastingNotes.palate: Crisp acidity provides excellent structure, supporting flavors of lime, citrus, and green apple. The mid-palate shows honeysuckle and subtle flint. Medium-bodied with good concentration and balance.
tastingNotes.finish: Clean and persistent finish with citrus and mineral notes. Bright acidity leaves the palate refreshed. Excellent length and purity.

foodPairings: Fresh oysters on the half shell

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2026; best enjoyed young

wines.description: A 2019 wine from California, showcasing crisp acidity and vibrant aromatics. This wine represents quality winemaking and terroir expression, offering exceptional drinking pleasure.

tastingNotes.palate: Crisp acidity provides excellent structure, supporting flavors of citrus, green apple, and pear. The mid-palate shows jasmine and subtle chalk. Medium-bodied with good concentration and balance.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2026; best enjoyed young

wines.description: A 2017 wine from California, showcasing refreshing fruit and elegant balance. This wine represents quality winemaking and terroir expression, offering exceptional drinking pleasure.

tastingNotes.aroma: Delicate aromas of strawberry and raspberry open the bouquet, with subtle floral notes. Fresh and inviting aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: Bright red berry flavors balanced by crisp acidity. Refreshing and food-friendly with elegant texture.
tastingNotes.finish: Clean, crisp finish with lingering red berry notes. Perfect for warm weather.

wines.description: A 2023 wine from California, showcasing crisp acidity and vibrant aromatics. This wine represents quality winemaking and terroir expression, offering exceptional drinking pleasure.

tastingNotes.aroma: Bright aromas of green apple and pear lead the nose, accented by orange blossom. Underlying granite adds terroir complexity. The profile is fresh, vibrant, and inviting.
tastingNotes.palate: Crisp acidity provides excellent structure, supporting flavors of white peach, melon, and lemon zest. The mid-palate shows white flowers and subtle wet stone. Medium-bodied with good concentration and balance.
tastingNotes.finish: Clean and persistent finish with citrus and mineral notes. Bright acidity leaves the palate refreshed. Excellent length and purity.
